name: Sarah Gridley
bio: Sarah Gridley is the author of three books of poetry: Weather Eye Open (University of California Press, 2005), Green is the Orator (University of California Press, 2010), and Loom (Omnidawn Publishing, 2013). Her poems have appeared or are forthcoming in the following journals: Antioch Review, Poetry magazine, New England Review, Hampden-Sydney Review, Bennington Review, Third Coast, West Branch Wired, Meridian, Harvard Review Online, Sycamore Review, and concīs. She is the recipient of the 2018 Cecil Hemley Award from the Poetry Society of America. Gridley teaches poetry at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio.
